overview: Imagine a restaurant where the only bill of fare is the sexual passions of the other patrons. Or consider a consumer segment on a news broadcast featuring sex toys and pleasure aids where the hosts not only rate their erotic effectiveness but demonstrate how they are to be lovingly used. It's all part of a new adult cable TV channel, and this film gives you a behind the scenes look at the incredibly intimate and sensually arousing programming.
title: Give It to Me
